AI stray

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

T

This article is a Stub and needs expansion.


The stray AI makes an NPC wander about it's base position.

base_x, _y, _z

These appear to be the central point around which the NPC wanders. (?)

radius_x, _y, _z

How far away the unit will get from the location along that axis. (?)
